About the Theme

Youtube is a minimal, one column jekyll theme.

Features

  • Minimal, you can focus on your content
  • Responsive
  • Disqus integration
  • Syntax highlighting
  • Optional post image
  • Social icons
  • Page for sharing projects
  • Optional background image
  • Simple navigation menu
  • MathJax support

Preview
